objects.text:
Premium Faux Leather
Gold Hardware Accents
Spacious Interior Design
Elegant Everyday Style

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This banner presents a luxurious and elegant product advertisement layout. The background features a diagonally split gradient composed of earthy tones, giving the setting a refined and premium look. The composition places a central product image (“product_image”) of a tan faux leather tote bag with gold accents, partially overlaying the lighter part of the background for visual emphasis.

The primary headline (“heading”) in tall uppercase white typography introduces the product category. Just below it, a stylistically bold subheading (“subheading”) in a gold hue draws attention with a unique font and scattered circular shadow element. Supporting text (“description”) highlights key product benefits in a clean, legible white font. A bold price tag (“price”) is positioned prominently in white for contrast and visibility.

The “cta_button” is a rectangular gold block accompanied by a “cta” text layer in dark brown, creating a visual call-to-action in harmony with the overall theme.

**Color palette:**
- Deep Brown: `#6B4226`
- Golden Yellow: `#D4AF37`
- Beige / Light Tan: `#F5DEB3`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Camel Brown: `#A67C52`
product_color: The product image features a sophisticated camel brown handbag accented with elegant gold hardware. The dominant camel brown color (#B98064) lends a sense of warmth and luxury, making it perfect for a sophisticated advertisement palette. Gold metallic details (#D4AF37) adorn the bag with a touch of opulence, enhancing its premium aesthetic. The texture of the material adds depth, with soft shadows and highlights blending seamlessly across its surface. These colors blend harmoniously while the gold accessories prominently stand out, drawing attention with their reflective finish. Suitable complementary tones include soft beige (#F5F5DC) and muted rose (#C7A58A) for a warm, classy banner design.
